dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset covers 1,000 driving scenarios spanning different cities (e.g., Boston and Singapore), collected via vehicle-mounted cameras and lidar sensors operating at a sampling frequency of 2 Hz, providing an exhaustive depiction of urban traffic dynamics.
dcterms:title: nuScenes dataset
